targets.query: SELECT count("distance") FROM "activities" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "type"
SELECT sum("distance") FROM "activities" WHERE $timeFilter AND (type =~ /^${type}$/)  GROUP BY "year"
SELECT cumulative_sum("distance") as distance, cumulative_sum("elevation") as elevation FROM "activities" WHERE $timeFilter AND (type =~ /^${type}$/)  GROUP BY "year"
SELECT sum("distance") FROM "activities" WHERE $timeFilter AND (type =~ /^${type}$/) GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
